info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Menard, northwestern Sangamon, southeastern Cass and northeastern Morgan Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallula, or 11 miles east of Virginia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pleasant Plains and Tallula around 225 AM CDT. Petersburg around 240 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Athens. This includes Interstate 55 near mile marker 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
